ALRPR.TA.summary: Alrov Properties and Lodgings Ltd., a real estate company, invests in, develops, and operates real estate projects in Israel, the United Kingdom, France, Switzerland, and the Netherlands. Its projects include investment properties and residential projects, as well as develops, owns, and operates 5 star luxury hotels. The company was founded in 1978 and is based in Tel Aviv, Israel.

GZT.TA.summary: Gazit Globe, Ltd, through its subsidiaries, owns, develops, and operates supermarket-anchored shopping centers and retail-based mixed-use properties in North America, Brazil, Israel, and Europe. It owns and operates 103 properties covering an area of approximately 2.5 million square meters. The company was incorporated in 1982 and is headquartered in Tel Aviv, Israel. Gazit Globe Ltd operates as a subsidiary of Norstar Holdings Inc.

GZTGF.summary: Gazit Globe, Ltd, through its subsidiaries, owns, develops, and operates supermarket-anchored shopping centers and retail-based mixed-use properties in North America, Brazil, Israel, and Europe. It owns and operates 103 properties covering an area of approximately 2.5 million square meters. The company was incorporated in 1982 and is headquartered in Tel Aviv, Israel. Gazit Globe Ltd operates as a subsidiary of Norstar Holdings Inc.

ISRS.TA.summary: Isras Investment Company Ltd operates in the real estate sector in Israel. The company operates through Income Producing Real Estate, Residential Real Estate and Real Estate for Sale, and Others segments. It engages in the planning, development, rental, and management of residential and construction projects, as well as infrastructure and construction activities. The company also operates other real estate projects. Isras Investment Company Ltd markets its products through direct and external marketing factors and brokers. It serves high-tech companies, trading and services industries, and individuals. The company was founded in 1950 and is based in Tel Aviv, Israel. Isras Investment Company Ltd is a subsidiary of Arad Investment & Industrial Development Ltd.

MGOR.TA.summary: Mega Or Holdings Ltd develops, manages, and rents real estate properties in Israel. It primarily develops and manages logistic, commercial, and future centers. The company was formerly known as Zahi Nahmias Holdings Ltd. and changed its name to Mega Or Holdings Ltd in May 2006. Mega Or Holdings Ltd was founded in 2002 and is based in Modi'in, Israel.

PTBL.TA.summary: Property and Building Corp. Ltd., together with its subsidiaries, operates as a real estate company in Israel and internationally. The company operates through Income Producing Properties in Israel, Income Producing Properties in USA, and Residential Construction in Israel segments. It develops, plans, builds, leases, and manages high tech parks, commercial and industrial parks, office buildings, retail centers, logistics and industrial buildings, and storage and parking lots, as well as holds land reserves for construction; acquires, develops, leases, manages, and maintains income-producing properties; and develops, plans, constructs, markets, and sells residential projects and neighborhoods. The company is based in Tel Aviv, Israel. Property and Building Corp. Ltd. operates as a subsidiary of Discount Investment Corporation Ltd.

RANI.TA.summary: Rani Zim Shopping Centers Ltd, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the development, construction, and management of commercial projects in Israel. It operates, manages, and rents shopping centers. The company is based in Petah Tikva, Israel.
